discourse_list.title: EIP-2027 Net contract size accounting (change C from State Rent v3 proposal)

content.content: Ethereum Improvement Proposals   State Rent C - Net contract size accounting Ethereum Improvement Proposals (EIPs) describe standards for the Ethereum platform, including core protocol specifications, client APIs, and contract standards.
content.GPT-summary: The post is an Ethereum Improvement Proposal (EIP) that describes a standard for the Ethereum platform. The author is explaining the proposal, and the post may be audited and reviewed by third parties.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
